Author: CrisF#3405
Content: ```Set the timeout block longer. If the dice creator node is offline, after the timeout block the sytem will automatically declare the bets winner and payout winning funds. Long timeout block will ensure house to not loose any funds if there is any downtime of the node and comes back online within the time.```
